sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SNCRoleUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SNCRoleUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SNCRoleUtil = Class.create();
SNCRoleUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	getSysID: function(roleName) {
		var role = new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
		var roleSysId = '';
		role.addQuery('name', roleName);
		role.query();
		if (role.next()) {
			roleSysId = role.getValue('sys_id');
		}
		return roleSysId;
	},
	
	groupRoleExists: function(groupdID, roleName) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_group_has_role');
		gr.addQuery('group', groupdID);
		gr.addQuery('role', this.getSysID(roleName));
		gr.query();
		return gr.hasNext();
	},
	
	type: 'SNCRoleUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-02-01 20:21:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>93b7a335931112003500db47c47ffb43</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SNCRoleUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Security Jump Start (ACL Rules)" source="com.snc.system_security">56c109436d6620100acb70b3534330db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_93b7a335931112003500db47c47ffb43</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-02-02 01:29:17</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>582</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
